title: Take Me Out to the Ballgame: Find the Probability
question_text:
The table below shows the distribution of the types of tickets that were sold for a minor league baseball game.
Seat TypeField BoxReserved BoxGrandstand
Reserved		BleachersPicnic Area / Standing
Relative Frequency38%20%14%6%


If one ticket holder at this game is selected at random to receive free tickets to an upcoming game, what is the probability that the winner is seated in either a field box seat or in the bleachers?
